statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: In the RPG game ��go back ice age��(I decide to develop the game after my undergraduate education), all heros have their own respected value, and the skill of killing monsters is defined as the following rule: one hero can kill the monstrers whose respected values are smaller then himself and the two respected values has none common factor but 1, so the skill is the same as the number of the monsters he can kill. Now each kind of value of the monsters come. And your hero have to kill at least M ones. To minimize the damage of the battle, you should dispatch a hero with minimal respected value. Which hero will you dispatch ? There are Q battles, in each battle, for i from 1 to Q, and your hero should kill Mi ones at least. You have all kind of heros with different respected values, and the values(heros�� and monsters��) are positive.

statement.title: Input
statement.content: The first line has one integer Q, then Q lines follow. In the Q lines there is an integer Mi, 0<Q<=1000000, 0<Mi<=10000.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each case, there are Q results, in each result, you should output the value of the hero you will dispatch to complete the task.

statement.title: Source
statement.content: 2008 ��Insigma International Cup�� Zhejiang Collegiate Programming Contest - Warm Up��4��
